product_summary: AI Music Generator (AMG) is a web-based tool that allows users to generate audio clips up to 30 seconds long by simply describing them with words. The tool is powered by Meta's AudioCraft technology and uses a Stable Diffusion model to create realistic audio from text prompts. AMG can be used to create a wide variety of audio content, including music, sound effects, and voiceovers.
product_pros: Easy to use: AMG has a simple and intuitive interface that makes it easy for anyone to create audio content, even without any prior experience.
Versatile: AMG can be used to create a wide variety of audio content, including music, sound effects, and voiceovers.
Powered by cutting-edge technology: AMG uses Meta's AudioCraft technology and a Stable Diffusion model to create realistic audio from text prompts.
Affordable: AMG offers a free trial and a variety of paid plans that are affordable for both individuals and businesses.
Cloud-based: AMG is a cloud-based tool that can be accessed from any device with an internet connection.
product_cons: Limited duration: AMG can only generate audio clips up to 30 seconds long.
Can be expensive: AMG's paid plans can be expensive for some users.
Requires an internet connection: AMG is a cloud-based tool that requires an internet connection to use.
Can be difficult to create complex audio content: AMG is best suited for creating simple audio content. It can be difficult to create complex audio content with the tool.
Still in development: AMG is still in development and some features may not be fully functional.

product_usecases.Music Production: AMG can be used to create music for a variety of purposes, including film, television, video games, and advertising.
product_usecases.Audio Editing: AMG can be used to edit audio clips, including removing unwanted noise, adjusting levels, and adding effects.
product_usecases.Sound Design: AMG can be used to create sound effects for a variety of purposes, including film, television, video games, and advertising.
product_usecases.Voiceovers: AMG can be used to create voiceovers for a variety of purposes, including e-learning, presentations, and marketing.
product_usecases.Other Creative Projects: AMG can be used for a variety of other creative projects, such as creating soundtracks for podcasts, developing sound installations, and designing sonic experiences.

product_toolfor.Musicians: AMG can be used by musicians to create music, sound effects, and other audio content.
product_toolfor.Audio Editors: AMG can be used by audio editors to edit audio clips, remove unwanted noise, and add effects.
product_toolfor.Sound Designers: AMG can be used by sound designers to create sound effects for film, television, video games, and advertising.
product_toolfor.Voiceover Artists: AMG can be used by voiceover artists to create voiceovers for e-learning, presentations, and marketing.
product_toolfor.Creative Professionals: AMG can be used by creative professionals for a variety of other projects, such as creating soundtracks for podcasts, developing sound installations, and designing sonic experiences.

product_pricing: AMG offers a free trial and a variety of paid plans. The paid plans range in price from $9.99 per month to $99.99 per month. The plans differ in terms of the number of audio clips that can be generated per month and the length of the audio clips that can be generated.
